repos_data.description: Kimai is a web-based multi-user time-tracking application. Works great for everyone: freelancers, companies, organizations - everyone can track their times, generate reports, create invoices and do so much more. SaaS version available at https://www.kimai.cloud
Empower your hosting business with FOSSBilling, the free and open-source solution for efficient billing and client management.
Chamilo is a learning management system focused on ease of use and accessibility
An ultra-lightweight blogging engine, written in PHP.
